# sshkey Provider

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = "~>1.4"

  required_providers {
    turing-pi-bmc = {
      source  = "jlec.de/dev/sshkey"
      version = ">=0.1"
    }
  }
}
provider "sshkey" {
  # example configuration here
}
```
